data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Corner awarded to Real Sociedad.
In the minute 2, Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
Real Sociedad to take a throw-in in Celta Vigo territory.
Can Real Sociedad capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Celta Vigo's half?
In the minute 5, Ball safe as Celta Vigo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Real Sociedad in Vigo.
Free kick in a good position for Real Sociedad!
In the minute 6, It's a goal kick for the home team in Vigo.
David Silva for the away team is judged to be offside.
Celta Vigo drive forward but Ruben Blanco is judged offside.
In the minute 16, Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
Adrian Cordero Vega awards the away team a throw-in.
Real Sociedad awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
In Vigo, Nolito of Celta Vigo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo in their own half.
In the minute 23, In Vigo, Real Sociedad push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
David Silva scores with a header and the away team now lead 0-1.
Aihen Munoz instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 26, Fran Beltran gets his shot on target but fails to score for Celta Vigo.
In Vigo Real Sociedad drive forward through Mikel Oyarzabal. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Real Sociedad.
In the minute 27, Adrian Cordero Vega awards Celta Vigo a goal kick.
Throw-in Celta Vigo.
Celta Vigo are pushing forward but Iago Aspas's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 29, Goal kick for Real Sociedad at Municipal de Balaidos.
Throw-in for Real Sociedad at Municipal de Balaidos.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in the half of Real Sociedad.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Celta Vigo close to the penalty box.
Celta Vigo have a dangerous throw-in.
Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
In the minute 33, Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Real Sociedad in their own half.
Great finish from Mikel Oyarzabal to give Real Sociedad a 0-2 lead.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
In the minute 38, In Vigo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jon Guridi (Real Sociedad) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
At Municipal de Balaidos, Celta Vigo are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 40, Ball safe as Celta Vigo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a Celta Vigo goal kick.
Free kick Celta Vigo.
In the minute 42, Iago Aspas of Celta Vigo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Real Sociedad have a goal kick.
Real Sociedad's David Silva gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Celta Vigo defender.
In the minute 43, Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
Adrian Cordero Vega will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Adrian Cordero Vega has blown to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo in their own half.
In the minute 46, Adrian Cordero Vega signals a throw-in for Celta Vigo, close to Real Sociedad's area.
The away team replace Mikel Oyarzabal with Portu.
In the minute 46, Oscar Garcia is making the team's first substitution at Municipal de Balaidos with Joseph Aidoo replacing Nestor Araujo.
The home team have replaced Miguel Baeza with Brais Mendez. This is the second substitution made today by Oscar Garcia.
Free kick for Real Sociedad in the half of Celta Vigo.
Celta Vigo's Jose Fontan has been booked in Vigo.
In the minute 48, Throw-in Real Sociedad.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a Real Sociedad throw-in in Celta Vigo's half.
Iago Aspas (Celta Vigo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 52, Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
Jose Fontan (Celta Vigo) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Adrian Cordero Vega awards Real Sociedad a goal kick.
In the minute 53, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Willian Jose puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-3.
That's a fine assist from Portu.
In the minute 56, Free kick Celta Vigo.
David Silva (Real Sociedad) has received a yellow card from Adrian Cordero Vega.
In the minute 57, Celta Vigo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Real Sociedad.
Santi Mina is replacing Fran Beltran for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
In Vigo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 59, At Municipal de Balaidos, Martin Zubimendi has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo in the half of Real Sociedad.
Can Celta Vigo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Sociedad's half?
In the minute 60, Adrian Cordero Vega awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Real Sociedad in their own half.
In the minute 62, Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Celta Vigo's Brais Mendez misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Real Sociedad at Municipal de Balaidos.
In the minute 64, Aihen Munoz is booked for the away team.
In the minute 65, Imanol Alguacil (Real Sociedad) is making a second substitution, with Ander Guevara replacing Ander Barrenetxea.
Real Sociedad make their third substitution with Aritz Aranbarri replacing Andoni Gorosabel.
Real Sociedad awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 66, Emre Mor is on a sub for Nolito for Celta Vigo.
Ball safe as Real Sociedad is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a Real Sociedad throw-in in Celta Vigo's half.
In the minute 68, Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Real Sociedad in their own half.
Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 70, Free kick Celta Vigo.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Celta Vigo.
In the minute 71, Jeison Murillo (Celta Vigo) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Real Sociedad have a goal kick.
Imanol Alguacil (Real Sociedad) is making a fourth substitution, with Martin Merquelanz replacing Jon Guridi.
Throw-in for Real Sociedad in the half of Celta Vigo.
In the minute 73, In Vigo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Real Sociedad to take a throw-in in Celta Vigo territory.
Corner awarded to Real Sociedad.
In the minute 74, Willian Jose (Real Sociedad) strikes at Municipal de Balaidos but his header is cleared.
Can Real Sociedad get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celta Vigo's half?
Free kick for Celta Vigo in the half of Real Sociedad.
In the minute 76, Robin Le Normand for Real Sociedad has been booked by Adrian Cordero Vega and receives a first yellow card.
An attacking Celta Vigo player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Iago Aspas pulls one back for Celta Vigo from the penalty spot.
In the minute 79, Real Sociedad have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
Roberto Lopez is replacing David Silva for the away team.
In the minute 80, In Vigo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a Real Sociedad throw-in in Celta Vigo's half.
Goal! Real Sociedad extend their lead to 1-4 through Willian Jose.
In the minute 81, Great play from Portu to set up the goal.
Real Sociedad to take a throw-in in Celta Vigo territory.
Can Celta Vigo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Sociedad's half?
In the minute 85, Adrian Cordero Vega awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Real Sociedad.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Real Sociedad in their own half.
Free kick for Real Sociedad in their own half.
Celta Vigo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Real Sociedad goal kick.
At Municipal de Balaidos the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vigo.
Free kick Real Sociedad.
It's 1-4 as the referee blows for full-time.
Celta Vigo's Jose Fontan has been shown a second yellow card and sent off.
